listings.title: Winter is Here Crochet Blanket
listings.description: A warm and cozy crochet blanket pattern perfect for those chilly winter nights.
listings.materials: Bernat Blanket Yarn, faux fur, acrylic yarn, and sewing thread

listings.title: West Coaster- Crochet Coasters
listings.description: Designed to mimic sacred geometric shapes found on the West Coast, sea shells and fern spirals.

listings.title: Hound Hoodies
listings.description: 9 fun animal crochet hoodie patterns to keep your pup warm and fashionable.
listings.materials: Acrylic yarn, Lion Brand Yarn Thick & Quick, polyfill stuffing

listings.title: Handmade Knit Chunky Beanie
listings.description: A beautifully hand-knit beanie made with soft, high-quality yarn and a faux fur pompom
listings.materials: Acrylic Yarn and faux fur pompom

listings.title: Crochet Woven Baby Blanket
listings.description: A delicate and soft crochet baby blanket perfect for a newborn.

listings.title: Knit Pumpkins
listings.description: These cute and squishy pumpkins are the perfect Fall accent for your home or to give as a housewarming gift.
listings.materials: Chunky acrylic yarn, polyfill stuffing, and a cinnamon stick stem.
